author: Anneli N
title: Fresh and comfortable
text: This hotel is a really good option if staying on the south side. Quite spacious rooms, good beds and very nice bathrooms. Only negative is random delivery of towels, and bad pressure on the water in the shower. Excellent breakfast and a very inviting swimming pool. There is also a gym here. Nice and helpful staff. Close to "the Globe theatre" and Tate modern.
